Text:
don't download, Ihave bug in this version that can't open LPT io service correctly.

I will send another torrent with 1.0.3 version.

sorry..

or to fix the bug, just rename:
C:\WINDOWS\system32\drivers\picprog.sys
into:
C:\WINDOWS\system32\drivers\io.sys

before uninstall this programmer reverse the fix.
any question about the programmer at: bbarbulovski@gmail.com
